title: Horror in TV and Film - Best of Coast to Coast AM 7/17/ 2020
itunes:title: Horror in TV and Film - Best of Coast to Coast AM 7/17/ 2020
description:
George Noory and Christopher Garetano discuss what makes a good horror film. They touch on the work of Alfred Hitchcock and how he influenced generations of filmmakers. Christopher gives his preference between making horror films or horror documentaries,.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
